group-participant.welcome: Hello {{@PPL}} üëã, Thank you so much for joining {{@GRP}} as one of our newest members. It's a pleasure to welcome you to our group!
group-participant.anticountry: Sorry {{@PPL}}, this group is prohibited for phone numbers with the prefix {{@NUM}}
group-participant.leave: It was an honor to meet with a {{@PPL}}. You deserve nothing but the best! Good bye üëã

group.subject: {{@PPL}} has changed the group name to {{@TTL}}

icon.change: {{@PPL}} has changed the group profile picture
icon.remove: {{@PPL}} has removed the group profile picture

group.description: {{@PPL}} has updated the group description to {{@TTL}}

restrict.on: {{@PPL}} has changed the group settings, only the group admins can change the settings
restrict.off: {{@PPL}} has changed the group settings, now group members can change the settings

announce.on: {{@PPL}} has changed the group settings, only group admins can send messages
announce.off: {{@PPL}} has changed the group settings, now group members can send messages

message.cooldown: Command is on cooldown, please wait for {{@SKNDS}}
message.maintenance: The command is under maintenance, you can't use it at the moment
message.ownerOnly: Commands can only be used by the bot owner, you cannot use them
message.premiumOnly: Commands can only be used by premium users, you cannot use them
message.privateOnly: Commands can only be used in private chats, you cannot use them in group chats
message.groupOnly: Commands can only be used in group chats, you cannot use them in private chats
message.botGroupAdmin: The command can only be used if the bot is an admin of the group
message.ownerGroup: Commands can only be used by the group owner, you cannot use them
message.adminGroup: Commands can only be used by group admins, you cannot use them

errorMessage.noCmd: It looks like the usage command is wrong. Please type {{@CMD}} to see an example.
errorMessage.timeout: Looks like the command is taking to long to respond. Please try again in a while
errorMessage.error: Looks like the command has an error: {{@ERRMSG}}. Please try again in a while
errorMessage.unknown: Looks like the command has encountered an unknown error. Please try again in a while

didyoumean.title: The command you typed is not listed, maybe this is what you mean:

language.text: You can change your language when interacting with me, here are some supported languages

menu.bottom: The following are some of the features found in the bot.

anticountry.add: Added country code successfully, here's a list of those in the group: {{@NUM}}
anticountry.remove: Removed country code successfully, here's a list of those in the group: {{@NUM}}
anticountry.enable: Successfully activate {{@CMD}}, bot will immediately kick group member with country code prefix: {{@NUM}}
anticountry.disable: Successfully deactivate {{@CMD}}, bots no longer kick group members with country code prefix: {{@NUM}}

status.text: Filter incoming members and kick those that are not allowed
status.numList: List of country code in the group: {{@NUM}}

anticountry.list: List of all available country codes based on {{@URL}}

antilink.enable: Successfully activate {{@CMD}}, bot will kick group member that send whatsapp group link
antilink.disable: Successfully deactivate {{@CMD}}, bot no longer kick group members that send whatsapp group link

antiviewonce.enable: Successfully activate {{@CMD}}, bot will resend messages that send as view once
antiviewonce.disable: Successfully deactivate {{@CMD}}, bot no longer resend messages that send as view once

group-add.caption: Invitation to join my WhatsApp group

group.group-demote: Successfully demoted {{@ADM}} to become a member

group-kick.failed: {{@NUM}} does not exist in the group

group.group-language: You can change the group's language when interacting with me, here are some supported languages

group-mute.enable: Successfully activated {{@CMD}}, bot will not respond to future commands in this group
group-mute.disable: Successfully activated {{@CMD}}, bot will respond to future commands in this group

group-notify.enable: Successfully activate {{@CMD}}, bot will send a message when there is an update on the group
group-notify.disable: Successfully deactivated {{@CMD}}, bot no longer send a message when there is an update on the group

group.group-promote: Successfully promote {{@ADM}} to become an admin

member-leave.enable: Successfully activate {{@CMD}}, bot will send a goodbye message when a participant leaves the group
member-leave.disable: Successfully deactivated {{@CMD}}, bot no longer sends goodbye messages when a participant leaves the group

member-welcome.enable: Successfully activate {{@CMD}}, bot will send a welcome message when a new participant join the group
member-welcome.disable: Successfully deactivate {{@CMD}}, bot no send a welcome message when a new participant join the group
